description: At the Warhammer Open event in Dallas, Games Workshop gave the general public the first opportunity to try it’s new Spearhead format for Age of Sigmar fourth edition. Alongside the guided demos happening just outside the main gaming hall, led by members of the AoS design team, there was a Spearhead blind box event. This […]
title: The Dallas Spearhead Event- Goonhammer’s Impressions

description: Codex: Chaos Space Marines is on shelves today and if you missed any of our coverage of the new book and its contents, don't worry - we've got you covered. Whether you're new to the faction or an old hand with the Heretic Astartes, everything you need to know about the faction's newest update is here.
title: The 10th Edition Codex: Chaos Space Marines Round-Up

description: Goonhammer's Doing Some Video! Check out our first video. Also we answer your questions about what we're planning.
title: Goonhammer’s Doing Some Video!

description: We appreciate Games Workshop providing us a copy of Dawnbringers VI: Hounds of Chaos earlier this week for us to review. Dawnbringers VI: Hounds of Chaos can be viewed a few different ways. One of those ways is as the last gasp of a dying edition. Another way, and how I view it, is as […]
title: Age of Sigmar Dawnbringers VI – The Rules
